achievement.title: First Blood!
achievement.text: You are so smart to finish tutorial that quick!

achievement.title: Penta Penta Kill!
achievement.text: Kill 25 enemies.

achievement.title: Just Warm Up!
achievement.text: Kill 50 enemies.

achievement.title: It's Raining Blood
achievement.text: Kill 100 enemies.

achievement.title: The Butcher
achievement.text: Kill 250 enemies.

achievement.title: Sangoku Musou
achievement.text: Kill 500 enemies! Are you sure you bought the right game?

achievement.title: Keyboard Rusher
achievement.text: Your Golden Finger killed 1000 enemies.

achievement.title: I... I Can't Stop!!
achievement.text: 2000. Although you felt sick to kill that much, you never stop.
It's hard to create a new achievement, so 6666 is nice though.

achievement.title: Bot and You
achievement.text: You have slained 88888 enemies, also believed as a bot user.

achievement.title: THIS IS SPARTA!
achievement.text: Obviously no one will treat you like a normal person after 999999 kills.

achievement.title: TestCase #11 - Kill 9999999 enemies
achievement.text: /* This is an auto test case, DO NOT USE IT ON REAL HUMAN! */

achievement.title: My Device Was Deemed Worthy
achievement.text: Got over 100 attack power while your device still works.

achievement.title: 10K Hours Of Training
achievement.text: It's hard to believe you spent 10K hours on this game to level 100!

achievement.title: Yet Another Epic Game In History
achievement.text: Time for us to play this game for you!

achievement.title: Unachievable
achievement.text: It is impossible to get this achievement.

achievement.title: Cheater!
achievement.text: Tried to finish this game by cheats.

achievement.title: Shame On You!
achievement.text: Increase your attack power without IAP or character downgrade.

achievement.title: Tech Failure
achievement.text: Decrease your attack power without IAP or character downgrade.

achievement.title: Weakling
achievement.text: Attack power less than 1. It's hard to imagine how anyone can achieve that.

achievement.title: Favored By God
achievement.text: Finished gossiping with the developer and gain its favor.

achievement.title: What A Long, "Memoriable" Trip It's Been
achievement.text: Finish all achievements.

achievement.title: UUDDLLRRBABA
achievement.text: It's the cheat of this game, or really?

achievement.title: Hello World
achievement.text: Why so excited? Everyone will get this achievement.
